item.title: ftp服务器
item.author: 作者
item.description: linux环境 1 2 3 4 5 LSB Version: :core-4.1-amd64:core-4.1-noarch Distributor ID: CentOS Description: CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core) Release: 7.3.1611 Codename: Core 安装 1 2 3 4 5 6 yum install vsftpd systemctl restart vsftpd.service # 重启vsftpd systemctl stop vsftpd.service # 停止vsftpd systemctl start vsftpd.service # 启动v
